description:
Samurai X protects a circus ringmaster and his talented human cannonball daughter from the threats of a jealous competitor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hayallerine Doğru Uç / İnsan Topu Marimo
Yume ni Mukatte Tobe! Houdan Musume Marimo no Bouken
จงบินไปตามความฝันเถอะสาวน้อยเมอริโม
夢に向かって飛べ! 砲弾娘マリモの冒険
